com.foreach.across.modules.user.services

Interface UserDirectoryService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDirectoryServiceImpl

    public interface UserDirectoryService
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<UserDirectory> getActiveUserDirectories()
      Get the list of user directories that should be used for authentication, in authentication precedence order.
      UserDirectory getDefaultUserDirectory()
      Get the default directory that should be used for all principals that do not have a specific directory set.
      Collection<UserDirectory> getUserDirectories() 
      UserDirectory save(UserDirectory userDirectory)
      Create or update a directory instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultUserDirectory

        UserDirectory getDefaultUserDirectory()
        Get the default directory that should be used for all principals that do not have a specific directory set. Usually the default internal directory is returned. This is the initial user directory created with id UserDirectory.DEFAULT_INTERNAL_DIRECTORY_ID. It should never be removed.
        Returns:
        instance

      • getUserDirectories

        Collection<UserDirectory> getUserDirectories()
        Returns:
        all user directories

      • getActiveUserDirectories

        Collection<UserDirectory> getActiveUserDirectories()
        Get the list of user directories that should be used for authentication, in authentication precedence order.
        Returns:
        active user directories sorted according to their order property

      • save

        UserDirectory save(UserDirectory userDirectory)
        Create or update a directory instance.
        Parameters:
        userDirectory - dto
        Returns:
        persisted entity
